title: Someone knows how to fix it? :/

replies.body: We players can't "fix" this, it's a server related issue, only the staff has the powers. xD

replies.body: Yeah that's been happening the past few days. It will most likely be fixed soon just be patient. :)

replies.body:
It's not a server bug, it is a Minecraft issue that was reported to be fixed yet obviously not and has since been re-opened: https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MC-34947?page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:all-tab...

There are no known fixes to this sadly so all I can tell you is just to keep trying, reset your minecraft, router and computer. Sorry for your trouble!
replies.body_tagged:
It's not a server bug, it is a Minecraft issue that was reported to be fixed yet obviously not and has since been re-opened: https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MC-34947?page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:all-tab...

There are no known fixes to this sadly so all I can tell you is just to keep trying, reset your minecraft, router and computer. Sorry for your trouble!

replies.body: I did a lot of things, like download again minecraft, reset my router, computer, well I can't play a lot of time :/ but thanks guys

replies.body:
when you play minecraft, make sure to close other bandwidth consuming devices/programs
^.^
replies.body_tagged:
when you play minecraft, make sure to close other bandwidth consuming devices/programs
^.^

replies.body: Trata de quitar todos los programas, tener la menor cantidad de ventanas abiertas, de momento, Ivy no va a llegar así que aguanta.
replies.body_tagged: Trata de quitar todos los programas, tener la menor cantidad de ventanas abiertas, de momento, Ivy no va a llegar así que aguanta.

replies.body:
Yo no hablo español:
What JuanoMC said, "try to remove all programs have the least amount of open windows for the moment Ivy will not get so enduring."
